Husband. Father. Engineer. Nerd. Sometimes I write long winded shit about music and movies. Pretty much your average Marvel dad. (He/Him/Black… with a capital “B”)

Avatar Photo: Marvel character Luke Cage (Power Man) drawing by Mike Deodato Jr.. Character is wearing iconic 70's costume, afro, yellow shirt and blue pants. He is in a fighting stance, with clenched fists.
